title: sAligarinnu
sahitya:
sAligarinnu biDuvare


anupallavi

  balu jAlagaLanu mADi kAla nUki kaLedare


caraNam 1    jaladoLu pokkaDagiralu balu giriyane pottu bhAravendenalu 
tale kukki nelake baggiralu halla kiri kiridariyendenalu
    caraNam 2    kAyava vancisi koLalu bala rAyarugaLalli hELu endenalu 
nyAyakke nuDivendenalu balu gAyata tanadinda kONeyoL hogalu
    caraNam 3    uTTaddu biTTu nindiralu balu keTTanendu kudureya piDidiralu 
koTTaddu koDalollenenalu balu ghaTTiga purandara viTTalaniralu
